name: pip-packages
description: Install/update pip packages into virtual environments

commands.title: pip-updater: Update and install pip packages

pip-updater.AutoUpdate.description: Enable or disable the automatic update check on launch of vscode

pip-updater.Timeout.description: Default timeout for download and installation of a given pip package

pip-updater.VirtualEnv.description: (optional) Virtual environment(s) in which pip packages should be installed/updated. Default is to use the default system environment and the default Python available in system PATH. If Python is not available in the PATH, this value is required.

items.title: Pip virtual environment name and (optional) python executable to use

virtualEnv.description: Name of the virtual environment (default is to use the default system environment, e.g. no environment)

pathToPython.description: Path to the python binary to use (default is to use system python in PATH)

pathToEnvs.description: Path to the directory that should contain the environments (default is to use ~/.virtualenvs or %USERPROFILE%\envs
